transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Ji good afternoon sir, Aditya baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji good afternoon.
Executive: Ji aapka concern raise kiya tha team se jo revert aaya tha maine aapko mail kar diya tha check kiya tha sir?
Customer: Kab mail kiya?
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Kab mail kiya aapne?
Executive: Aapko kar diya tha 12 baje ke aas pass.
Customer: Aaj?
Executive: Haan aaj kiya hai subah exact 11:30, 11:30 exact mein sir.
Customer: Sir main check karke aapko call karta hu.
Executive: Theek hai. Lagbhag aadhe aadhe ghante mein call karta hu main aapko.
Customer: Okay sir okay sir pahunch ke call kar lijiyega please.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know when the mail was sent.



Resolution:

- Executive informed that mail was sent at 11:30 AM.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the mail and call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- mail, revert, concern
